Posts.Content: Just read your post and am wishing you got good news today. (((hugs))
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Just breathe... and don't google everything, because you'll just drive yourself crazy! Keep occupied doing silly things. I know its easier said than done, but if you let yourself dwell on what could be, you'll become a puddle. Best of luck!
Posts.Title: Got the dreaded callback
